collection.name: Jadu Hoverboard
collection.description:
Upcoming Presale: [Jadu AVA](https://twitter.com/JaduAVAs/status/1526618896085622785?s=20&t=Lr7aZCASKGGoJCkFc4DLoQ) • 1st Collection: [Jadu Jetpacks](https://opensea.io/collection/jadu-jetpack)

Our sophomore collection takes things to the next level with Jadu's AR features showcased for presale allocations, unboxings and gameplay. Find your favorite Hoverboard in this richly varied collection to cruise in AR.

Jadu Hoverboards serve as the perfect entry keys to the Mirrorverse.

Signature Series: Grimes • Lewis Hamilton • Snoop Dogg • Mimi • Trippy
